posts.post_content:
I believe I have all of his t206s (there are three, right?) but I am looking to collect all of his cards. 

Condition does not matter, graded or raw I am fine with, but prefer no tears or paper loss. 

I won't have cash until Monday but wanted to get the ball rolling. Do you have any Bender cards for sale?

[url]https://www.loc.gov/collections/baseball-cards/?fa=subject%3Abender%2C+chief+%28team+member%29[/url]
Have A P2, T205 and an E90-1 here: [url]https://t206.monkberry.com/index.html[/url]
